name: GPT-4o Mini Audio Preview (Dec 2024)
description: GPT-4o Mini Audio Preview December 2024 release - a cost-efficient variant optimized for asynchronous audio input and output, offering 75% cost savings compared to GPT-4o Audio Preview.
notes: December 17, 2024 release provides audio capabilities at 25% of the cost of GPT-4o audio models ($10/$20 per 1M tokens vs $40/$80). Focused on text and audio modalities only - does not support image/vision capabilities. Suitable for test and development with preview usage limits.
